scripts.userCreate: node -e "(async () => console.log(await require('./p8Users').handler({'operation': 'createUser','payload': {'Item': {'city': 'TestTown','contact': {'name': 'Mr. Contact','contactEmail': 'contact@gmail.com','phone': '1234567890'},'churchName': 'Church Name','phone': 1234567890,'postalCode': 12345,'address': '123 Main St.','state': '??'}}})))();"
scripts.userUpdate: node -e "(async () => console.log(await require('./p8Users').handler({'operation': 'updateUser','payload': {'Item': {'uid': '3cb2828f48ead2b5358357d0f7e65472','city': 'TestTown','contact': {'name': 'Mr. Contact','contactEmail': 'contact@gmail.com','phone': '1234567890'},'churchName': 'Church Name','phone': 1234567890,'postalCode': 12345,'address': '9 Main St.','state': '??'}}})))();"
scripts.locationCreate: node -e "(async () => console.log(await require('./p8Locations').handler({'operation': 'createLocation','payload': {'Item': {'city': 'TestTown','contact': {'name': 'Mr. Contact','contactEmail': 'contact@gmail.com','phone': '1234567890'},'churchName': 'Church Name','phone': 1234567890,'postalCode': 12345,'address': '123 Main St.','state': '??'}}})))();"
scripts.locationUpdate: node -e "(async () => console.log(await require('./p8Locations').handler({'operation': 'updateLocation','payload': {'Item': {'uid': '3cb2828f48ead2b5358357d0f7e65472','city': 'TestTown','contact': {'name': 'Mr. Contact','contactEmail': 'contact@gmail.com','phone': '1234567890'},'churchName': 'Church Name','phone': 1234567890,'postalCode': 12345,'address': '9 Main St.','state': '??'}}})))();"
